Kalyn Ponga was left fuming when he was taken out of a try-scoring chance late in Newcastle's 32-20 loss to the North Queenslad Cowboys.

articles.title: New Zealand Warriors re-commit to Gosford NRL stay - Wide World of Sports
articles.description: Interim coach responds to request
articles.content:
Warriors players have re-committed to staying in Australia for at least another two weeks, allaying fears some of their stars could return home to New Zealand.
